titleInfo.title: ‘Umdat al-muḥtajj fī ḥukm al-shaṭranj عمدة المحتج في حكم الشطرنج Sakhāwī, Muḥammad ibn ‘Abd al-Raḥmān سخاوي، محمد بن عبد الرحمن

physicalDescription.extent: Material: Western laid paperDimensions: 200 x 150 mm leaf [130 x 100 mm (ff. 1r-18v) / 150 x 95 mm (ff. 19r-52r) written]Foliation: Eastern Arabic foliation in pencil (?), British Museum foliation in pencilRuling: No ruling visible (ff. 1r-18v) / misṭarah (ff. 19r-52r); 23 lines per page; vertical spacing 17 lines per 10 cm (ff. 1r-18v) / 16 lines per 10 cm (ff. 19r-52r)Script: NaskhInk: Black ink, with rubricated headings and overlinings and diagrams in redBinding: Modern blue cardboard binding with flap. Paper on binding has watermark 'Gouvernement Egyptien' with crescent moon and star, and crescent moon and three stars. The same watermark can be seen in ff. 55 and 56, which are later additions and have been left blankCondition: Water damage more extensive towards front of volume; minor insect damageMarginalia: See especially ff. 41r and 44rSeals: None

mods.abstract: Treatise on the legality of chess by the hadith scholar and historian Abū al-Khayr Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ‘Abd al-Raḥman al-Sakhāwī al-Shāf‘ī (أبو الخير شمس الدين محمد بن عبد الرحمن السخاوي الشافعي, d. 1497)The copy is missing one or more folios at the beginning so the text begins in the middle of the author's preface (see ed. al-Shanbarī [Bayrūt: al-Dār al-ʻArabīyah lil-Mawsūʻāt, 2006] p. 30, line 15; ed. al-Ḥarīrī and Ka‘kah [al-Kuwayt: Dar al-Nawadir, 2012] p. 30, line 11). Neither of the editions of this text is based on the present manuscript, which contains more text at the end than either edition. The end of ed. al-Shanbarī [Bayrūt: al-Dār al-ʻArabīyah lil-Mawsūʻāt, 2006] corresponds with f. 48v, line 9 and the end of ed. al-Ḥarīrī and Ka‘kah [al-Kuwayt: Dar al-Nawadir, 2012] corresponds with f. 44, line 17 (directly before the supplement [تتمة]).Two scribes completed this manuscript. The first copied ff. 1r-18v and the second ff. 19r-52r.The text contains 4 diagrams:Table (جدول) of a chess board (f. 4r);Circular diagram (f. 33r);Circular diagram (f. 34v);Chess board as a magic square (وفق) of 8 x 8 cells (f. 35v).Contents:Introduction (مقدمة, ff. 1r-5r [defective at beginning]);Chapter One (الباب الأول, ff. 5r-7v);Chapter Two (الباب الثاني, ff. 7v-12r);Chapter Three (الباب الثالث, ff. 12r-25v);Conclusion (خاتمة, ff. 25v-44r);Supplement (تتمة, ff. 44r-52r).Begins (f. 1r, lines 1-3, defective [= p. 30, lines 15-18 ed. al-Shanbarī; p. 30, lines 11-14 ed. al-Ḥarīrī and Ka‘kah]):من النخال ويعتمد في استرواحه مطالعة الأخبار والمغازي وفائق الأشعارالتي هي وأحلى من الزلال ويعلم أنه وإن فاق بسببه أعقلا فهو في الحقيقة استفاللا سيما إن كان عند لعبه ذا فصاحة وفي الدروس يأخذه السعال ...Ends (ff. 51v, line 23-52r, line 5):ولأسامة ابن مرشدانظر إلى لاعب الشطرنج يجمعها * مغالبًا ثم بعد الجمع يرميهاكالمرء يكدح للدنيا ويجمعها * حتى إذا مات خلاها وما فيهاوفي روايةأما ترى لاعب الشطرنج يجمعها * مبالغًا ثم بعد الجمع يرميهاكذلك المرء في الدنيا يجمعها * حتى إذا مات خلاها وما فيهاColophon (f. 52r, lines 6-10):تم والحمد لله وحدهوصلى الله على سيدنامحمد وعلى آلهوصحبهوسلم
